text: The New Babylon () is a 1929 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Grigori Kozintsev and Leonid Trauberg.На Культурном форуме "Лендок" покажет редкие исторические лентыГлавный дирижер Большого театра Туган Сохиев открыл музыкальный фестиваль в Тулузе It stars Arnold Arnold, Sergei Gerasimov, and David Gutman. ==Actors== *Arnold Arnold - deputy *Sergei Gerasimov - journalist Loutro *David Gutman - owner of the shop "New Babylon" *Oleg Zhakov - member of the Paris Commune *Yanina Zhejmo - milliner Teresa *Andrei Kostrichkin - bailiff == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:1929 drama movies Category:1920s historical movies Category:Movies set in the 1870s Category:Movies directed by Grigori Kozintsev Category:Movies directed by Leonid Trauberg Category:Soviet silent movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The New Babylon
